sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_451607_uac.WebhookIntegration</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>WebhookIntegration</name><script><![CDATA[var WebhookIntegration = Class.create();

WebhookIntegration.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {},

  sendWebhook: function(ritm) {
    // Your webhook logic here
    // Use GlideHTTPRequest to make the HTTP request
    // Example:
    var ritmNumber = ritm.getValue('number');
    var payload = {
      ritmNumber: ritmNumber,
      // Add other data you want to include in the payload
    };
    url="https://atlanta.stonebranchdev.cloud/resources/universalevent/push/snow_event_ritm?access_token=ucp_MB9kkwvSFNCzBJg82uRJDKIgYXpmamKbu2LCKxPA";
    var request = new GlideHTTPRequest(url);
    request.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    request.post(JSON.stringify(payload));
  },

  type: 'WebhookIntegration'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-02 13:18:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>d57c1ba097ebf114a56afb200153af17</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>WebhookIntegration</sys_name><sys_package display_value="UAC" source="x_451607_uac">23f6417a2f520110e2b4808cf699b69f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="UAC">23f6417a2f520110e2b4808cf699b69f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d57c1ba097ebf114a56afb200153af17</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-02 13:21:03</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
